name: kiratto_prichan_s2_ed2
notes: This is a woodwind sextet arrangement of the second ending song for the second season of the anime キラッとプリ☆チャン called 「Brand New Girls」. The composers are 栗原暁 and 前田佑.
Note that this arrangement is transposed a couple semitones higher than the original pitch of the song.

Also, thanks to Mats Helgesson for the clarinet soundfont I'm using for the clarinet 1 part. It's a bit hard to control though and so it's a bit overly quiet in many places because otherwise at higher volumes the timbre gets too abrasive for my taste.
